item1:
命令数据的查询
Query of command data
item2:
可查询所有已完成和未完成的搬运命令数据
Query all completed and unfinished handling order data
item4:
最近29,998笔内的命令数据
Order data in the last 29,998 entries
item5:
命令信息的查询条件
Query conditions for command information
输出
item6:
命令数据
Command data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的命令数据，系统将提示查无此命令信息
If there is no command data that meets the requirements, the system will prompt you to check for no command information.
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Cmd. No后点选Query查询命令数据
Enter query conditions or select Cmd. No and click Query to query command data
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
